mapper.insert: insert into member (id, password, name, phone_number, email, fin_account) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone_number}, #{email}, #{fin_account})
mapper.update: update member set password = #{password}, phone_number = #{phone_number}, email = #{email} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update member set status = if(status = 0, 1, 0) where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{id} and password = #{password}
